Sentencas: Analytic study based on energy analysis is conducted on a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) integrated in a gas turbine power plant GT.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The Tunisian natural gas is used as fuel for the SOFC and the GT cycle.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: An external pre-reforming system is installed before the SOFC.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: Heat recovery systems are adopted to valorize the waste heat at the SOFC and GT exhausts.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The gas from the SOFC exhaust is also used as additional supply of the combustion chamber.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The equations governing the electrochemical processes and the energy balances of the power plant components are established.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: Numerical simulations using EES software are performed.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The influences of key operating parameters, such as ambient temperature, air flow, pre-reforming fraction and fuel utilization on the performance of the SOFC-GT hybrid system, are analyzed.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The integration of the SOFC enhances the hybrid cycle efficiency of about 50%.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The increase of the ambient temperature reduces the system efficiencies.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The utilization factor has a negative effect on the SOFC temperature and voltage which leads to a decrease in the system performances, while the pre-reforming fraction has a positive effect on the indicated parameters.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: The SOFC voltage increases with the air molar flow rate.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: However, required air compressor power becomes important.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: That reduces significantly the SOFC efficiency.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant

Sentencas: A small improvement of about 2% is obtained for the hybrid cycle efficiency SOFC-GT.
Titulo: Energetic Performance Optimization of a SOFC-GT Hybrid Power Plant
